title: Vector Casting (Viktor E, Rumble R, Taliyah W)
body: Is it possible to remove indicators when you cast these abilities with quick cast? I would prefer not having any type of indicators showing up when casting these spells.

replies.body: You might have the 'quickcast with indicators' turned on in the in-game options. Check for that option in a practice game, and let me know if that does the trick for ya!

Sorry for the late response. 
No everything is off. I checked that already and i used to be able to cast them without having any indicators showing up. Any idea?
